original_text: He will love you and bless you and increase your numbers. He will bless the fruit of your womb, the crops of your land—your grain, new wine and olive oil—the calves of your herds and the lambs of your flocks in the land he swore to your ancestors to give you.
korean_text: 곧 너를 사랑하시고 복을 주사 너를 번성하게 하시되 네게 주리라고 네 조상들에게 맹세하신 땅에서 네 소생에게 은혜를 베푸시며 네 토지 소산과 곡식과 포도주와 기름을 풍성하게 하시고 네 소와 양을 번식하게 하시리니

sentences.original_text: He will bless the fruit of your womb
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 네 태의 열매를 축복할 것이며

sentences.original_text: your grain, new wine and olive oil
sentences.korean_translation: 네 곡식, 새 포도주와 감람 기름을

sentences.original_text: and the lambs of your flocks
in the land he swore to your ancestors
